comments.body: Why not expose `validate` on the `StructuredGenerator` interface?  Why would we ever want to allow someone to not have it?

The rationale was that `StructuredGenerator` was from the caller's perspective, and caller's did not have to call `Validate`.  A complaint I had with the current generator framework was that the proper place to call `Validate()` was ill-defined.  I thought not including it here made it implicit that the `StructuredGenerate()` did all requisite validation.
